34#include <config.h>
35#include <krb5/roken.h>
36
37int ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION
38memset_s(void *s, size_t smax, int c, size_t n)
39{
40 volatile unsigned char *p = s;
41
42#ifdef _WIN32
43 if (c == 0) {
44 SecureZeroMemory(s, n);
45 return 0;
46 }
47#endif
48
49 while (n--)
50 *p++ = c;
51
52 return 0;
53}
54
